name: Armless Hero.
description:
Controls:    (Set Querty)

W: Forward,  S:Backward,

D: Right,       A:Left,  

Space: Jump,  

RightMouseButton:Block,

R: Rest,

Gamplay:    

Having lost your right hand, you find yourself in this place where everyone is trying to kill you. You can only rely on your shield and your agility to get you out.

Luckily people here seem stupid enough to kill each other without doing it on purpose, try to position yourself and dodge at the right time for as many people as possible to kill each other

Tricks:

the ennemys spawns when you are far from the spawn point.

you can deflect the mages fireballs.

you can parry the monters and the warriors attacks.

levelup add spawns points.
